DOC.brief_summary: To measure long-term change weight plasma lipid switch antipsychotic treatment aripiprazole
DOC.detailed_description: To measure long-term change weight , plasma lipid fast blood glucose switch antipsychotic treatment aripiprazole , 1 year , open label study in-patients schizophrenia . The measurement weight lipid profile fast blood glucose measure baseline every 3 month 1 year .
DOC.criteria: DSMIV diagnosis schizophrenia sign informed consent comorbid substance abuse substance dependence pregnancy lactation
